Param.Name: ChildSelect
Param.Value: Hql;select mu.Id from MarketUnit mu join mu.Subject s join s.bagSubjectCommodity sc join sc.TCommodity t with t.Key='GAS' where mu.Id=:NodeId

Param.Name: ChildCaptionFormat

Param.Name: ChildCaptionFormat
Param.Value: Hodnoty alokace

Param.Name: ChildSelect
Param.Value: Hql;select Id as CaptionId,Caption as CaptionText,Id as Id from EDI_GDT_Version order by Id

Param.Name: ChildCaptionFormat
Param.Value: {CaptionId~00} {CaptionText}

Param.Name: ChildSelect
Param.Value: Hql;select P.Id as CaptionId,P.Caption as CaptionText,DI.Id as Id from EDI_GDT_DataInstance DI join DI.GDTProduct P join DI.MessageHeader MH join MH.MarketUnit MU with MU.Id=:NodeId0 join MH.Version V with V.Id=:NodeId1 order by P.Id

Param.Name: ChildCaptionFormat
Param.Value: {CaptionId~00} {CaptionText}

Param.Name: ParentIdSelect
Param.Value: Hql;select MU.Id,V.Id from EDI_GDT_DataInstance DI join DI.GDTProduct P join DI.MessageHeader MH join MH.MarketUnit MU join MH.Version V
